name: StrategyHegicWBTC
description: These three strategies work together to alternatively use HEGIC to buy ETH or WBTC lots on HEGIC.co. While the vault is building up the required 888,000 HEGIC needed to buy a lot, it lends it out on C.R.E.A.M to earn interest. The vault also keeps a buffer of HEGIC in reserve for withdrawals earning interest in CREAM.
author: anonymous
